name: Christmas Tales
description:
Game made for the Secret Santa Jam 2020.

The game is far from perfect and a lot of stuff were cut out in the end, but I think it ended being a nice game.

I'm sorry if you find any misspelling. English is not my first language, but I don't think there are any major mistakes.

Hope you enjoy, try to play with headphones if possible.

Also, not related, but if you like this game, try my game Breath that I'm just going to release on steam:

Breath no Steam (steampowered.com)

See ya!
